      • update

        public void update(Item item,
          User updUser)
            throws ConnectionError,
                   ItemExistsException
        Update the Item. Uses the Item ID to identify the Item to update. If the Item doesn't exist, it is inserted.
        Parameters:
        item - The Item to update
        updUser - The user making this update
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
        ItemExistsException - This is actually not thrown w/ the current implementation
